snippet.title: Police investigate man's death in Perth suburb of Balga
snippet.content: The death of a 36-year-old man is being investigated by the state's homicide squad in the inner-northern Perth suburb of Balga. According to WA Police, officers were called to the house on Darlington Crescent just after 8:30pm Friday night. A man was treated by St John Ambulance officers but he died at the scene.
